column1: Alan Greenspan this afternoon took the oath of office as Chairman of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System for a fourth four-year term commencing today.  The oath was administered in Dr. Greenspan's office by Vice Chairman Roger W. Ferguson, Jr.President Clinton nominated Dr. Greenspan on January 4 and the Senate confirmed him on February 3.  He originally took office on August 11, 1987.
